nodes.bodyText: Changing the workflow definition within the workflow does not seem to be the best way to achieve this. This makes the behavior seem like a side-effect rather than intentional.
Agreed, but when called updateWorkflowOutput() in deciderService, Checking the workflowDefintion's outputParameters rather than workflow output which has changed in Terminate.java.
Removed the code change which modifies workflow definition and added check in DeciderService which seems the better way to fix the bug.
